title: Keeping Up with the Kardashians
overview: A tempest of siblings, business and fame engulf Olympic decathlete Bruce Jenner and paparazzi fave Kim Kardashian as their huge Hollywood families collide.

episodes.title: Loving and Letting Go
episodes.overview: Bruce and Kris discuss their future. Meanwhile, Khloe and Lamar's relationship continues to decline.

episodes.title: How To Deal
episodes.overview: Scott starts taking karate lessons. Khloe is displeased with an interview that took her words out of context. Kris tries to get Jonathan away from Kim.

episodes.title: And All That Jazzzzzzz
episodes.overview: Rob tells Khloe that she has the option of moving in with him. Kris thinks about going on broadway. Kourtney discovers that Scott has been lying again.

episodes.title: A Surprise Engagement - Part 1
episodes.overview: Kanye flies the family to San Francisco in order to propose to Kim at AT&T Park. Kris is freaking out when she gets word that Kim's house won't be ready. Kourtney and Khloe get some revenge.

episodes.title: A Surprise Engagement - Part 2
episodes.overview: The family flies to San Francisco, where Kanye has set-up a birthday surprise for Kim at AT&T Park. Everyone is shocked once Kanye proposes to Kim.

episodes.title: 2 Birthdays and a Yard Sale
episodes.overview: Kourtney wants to have a Kardashian yard sale. Kendall starts planning for her 18th birthday celebration. Bruce feels that his upcoming birthday doesn't need to be acknowledged.

episodes.title: The Courage to Change
episodes.overview: Khloe decides that she has to choose where she wants her relationship with Lamar to go. After having to deal with the news of his mother, Kourtney plans a vacation for her and Scott. Rob gets himself checked out from the doctor.

episodes.title: We're Having a Baby!
episodes.overview: Season 8 begins with Kim's family overjoyed about her pregnancy, however, Kim seems a little less excited. At the same time, Bruce considers getting a space he can call his own; and Kourtney is encouraged by Scott to make a backdoor deal.

episodes.title: Enough Is Enough
episodes.overview: Kim and Khloe defend their mom against allegations made by tabloid magazines; at the same time, Bruce has a heart-to-heart chat with Brody about problems they've had in the past; and Kim offers to help Rob lose some weight.

episodes.title: Agree to Disagree
episodes.overview: While working out the details of her divorce, Kim is rushed to the hospital with a health issue. Bruce and Kris disagree regarding having guns in the home.

episodes.title: Papa, Can You Hear Me?
episodes.overview: Bruce deals with his hearing loss; Scott learns of a woman with cancer who wants to meet him; Khloe introduces a new puppy to the family; and Kris is concerned that she might have a stalker.

episodes.title: I Will Fix You
episodes.overview: Kris notices the difference in Rob and works to fix things. Khloe continues to improve her bond with Kylie and Kendall. Scott faces his fears in order to advance his racing career.

episodes.title: Some Moms Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Khloe feels left out when Kourtney and Kim bond over babies; Leah has trouble finishing her and Brandon's new music release; Kris becomes bladder shy.

episodes.title: Home Is Where Your Mom Is
episodes.overview: Kim is in need of a place to stay after learning her new home won't be ready in time for the baby's arrival; and Kourtney finds it curious that Scott is spending so much time with her pregnant sis. Elsewhere, a Ping-Pong tournament gets Bruce and Brandon's competitive juices flowing.

episodes.title: Greece Is the Word
episodes.overview: Tensions between Kris and Brody threaten to spoil a family vacation to Greece. At the same time, Kim receives news about her divorce, while Khloe and Scott plan a surprise for Kourtney.

episodes.title: Greece Him Up
episodes.overview: Kris gets overly friendly with Brody; Khloe and Kourtney decide to make this vacation one to remember.

episodes.title: Opa!
episodes.overview: Scott shows up to Greece with only one day left; Kendall feels like she's being left out; a putting green at the Jenner home.

episodes.title: Life's a Beach (House)
episodes.overview: Kris disagrees with Kendall's plan to find a beach house for the summer; Brandon and Brody start work on a putting green; Khloe worries about a sexy photoshoot.

episodes.title: Kris's Mother-In-Law
episodes.overview: After visiting Bruce's mother, Kris begins to worry. Kim helps Kylie start her fashion blog. The family collaborates on a surprise for Kris.

episodes.title: The Kardashian Chainsaw Massacre
episodes.overview: Rob shocks everyone when he takes up chainsaw art in Khloe's backyard. Meanwhile, Kim plans to get back at her judgmental family by secretly feeding them placenta, and Bruce takes some of Jimmy Fallon's jokes a little too personally.

episodes.title: Backdoor Bruiser
episodes.overview: Kris is confused when Kendall starts spending more time with the Jenner side of the family; The kids attempt to embarrass Bruce by recreating his and Kris's lost sex tape; Khloe tries to figure out her memory issues.

episodes.title: Baby Shower Blues
episodes.overview: Kourtney and Khloe can't believe that Kim doesn't want a baby shower; Kris and Kylie plot to get rid of Bruce's gun; Khloe gets self-conscious about her body.

episodes.title: More to the Story
episodes.overview: After Khloe's numerous attempts to conceive a child, Kim discusses the possibility of adoption with her. Kris thinks that Scott sold a scooter that she gave to him as a gift. Bruce trains Khloe's dog without her knowledge.

episodes.title: Paparazzi & Papas
episodes.overview: Growing tired of the constant presence of the paparazzi, Kim creates a plan to throw them off her trail once she goes into labor. Kourtney and Khloe attempt to set-up a blind date for their grandma.

episodes.title: All Signs Point to North
episodes.overview: Kim learns that she will be giving birth sooner than she thought. Kris continues to prepare for the baby. Bruce receives some wise words from Brody and Khloe attempts to restore peace within the family.

episodes.title: Close Encounters of the Kardashian Kind
episodes.overview: Bruce takes the family out for a camping trip, and Khloe uses the trip to hunt for aliens. Kris is preparing to launch her talk show and asks for everyone's support.

episodes.title: Kylie's Sweet 16
episodes.overview: Kris is tasked with babysitting a pig. Kylie starts planning her sweet 16 celebration. Rob and Khloe talk about their current living situation.

episodes.title: Who's Your Daddy
episodes.overview: Kris decides to pursue a DNA test to prove Khloe's paternity. Kourtney angers Kim when she takes over relocating DASH & Bruce goes to extremes to get the family’s attention.

episodes.title: Momager Dearest
episodes.overview: Kourtney's resentment towards her mom rises to the surface again after Kris releases a memoir detailing the affair that destroyed her first marriage. Unable to keep her attitude (and pregnancy hormones) in check, Kourt's nasty digs and comments toward Kris reach a whole new level, forcing her sisters, and even Scott, to confront her behavior. Will she get to the root of her anger and forgive her mom? Meanwhile, Kendall and Kylie start their gig at "Seventeen" magazine, but the job causes a rift between the usually close sisters.

episodes.title: Everybody's Wigging Out
episodes.overview: Kim starts wearing wigs; Rob hurts Bruce's feelings when he says he never had a male role model growing up; Kris gives in to road rage.

episodes.title: The Family That Plays Together
episodes.overview: Kris gets pestered by Bruce to sign his son, Brandon, to her new music management company. Meanwhile, Kourtney doesn’t appreciate Scott’s romantic gestures and Kris tries to get the whole family to play tennis again with disastrous results.

episodes.title: The Man in the Memoir
episodes.overview: Kris runs into the man she had an affair with over twenty years ago and wonders if she should arrange another meeting with him. Meanwhile, Kourtney doesn’t approve of Kim and Scott hanging out together and Kendall and Kylie ruin Kris’s carpet.

episodes.title: The Dominican Republic, Part One
episodes.overview: The family’s Dominican Republic vacation gets off to a rocky start when Kourtney causes herself, Kim, and Scott to miss their flight. Meanwhile, Bruce and Scott can’t resolve their differences

episodes.title: The Dominican Republic, Part Two
episodes.overview: The family vacation continues as Scott starts to feel like an outcast.Kris wakes up with a mysterious medical condition & Kourt must decide what to do about an ultimatum from Scott

episodes.title: Sometimes You Need to Adjust
episodes.overview: In part one of this two part story, Khloe returns to LA to face increasing demands on her time from the family. Scott has to be on his best behavior at a sweet 16 appearance in NYC

episodes.title: Sometimes You Need to Adjust: Part Two
episodes.overview: Khloe continues to feel pressure from the family and must decide if she will go to NY for Scott’s restaurant opening. The family wonders about Kim's relationship with an old friend.

episodes.title: The Royal Treatment
episodes.overview: Kris wants Khloe to see Bruce’s dark side. Scott hits London with Kim & Rob and gets a royal title and a big head. Kim’s busy schedule leaves no time for hanging out with Jonathan

episodes.title: Affairs of the Everhart
episodes.overview: While Bruce finds a golf buddy in supermodel Angie Everhart Kris wonders if she should call up an old ‘buddy’ of her own.Rob fights with Khloe when he moves back in with her & Lamar

episodes.title: Parent Trapped
episodes.overview: When Kris can’t prove her innocence to Bruce the kids force the couple to work out their issues. Kim makes Lamar go the dentist and Rob fears he’s losing his hair

episodes.title: Mothers & Daughters
episodes.overview: The girls urge Kris to take a trip to San Diego to see her sick mother. Kourt looks into water birth and Bruce checks into a sleep clinic to get his nighttime ticks worked out.

episodes.title: Tales From the Kardashian Krypt
episodes.overview: Kim and Khloe buy Mason a fish and Kris tells the family that she wants to plan her funeral.

episodes.title: Kardashian Therapy - Part One
episodes.overview: Oprah comes to the house to interview the family. Kim’s desire to explore life as an individual threatens her sisters. Rob breaks down during a family therapy session

episodes.title: Kardashian Therapy - Part Two
episodes.overview: A tempest of siblings, business and fame engulf Olympic decathlete Bruce Jenner and paparazzi fave Kim Kardashian as their huge Hollywood families collide.

episodes.title: Cuts Both Ways
episodes.overview: Tired of Kourt making all the decisions, Scott considers a vasectomy.Kris goes in for surgery to replace her breast implants and Kim asks Khloe to go with her to a fertility clinic

episodes.title: Baby, Baby, Baby
episodes.overview: As the family prepares to welcome Kourt’s new baby into the world, Khloe looks into why she can’t conceive and Kim starts the process to freeze her eggs

episodes.title: Dishing It Out
episodes.overview: The Kardashians show never before seen footage and share some of their favorite moments from the series.

episodes.title: Family vs. Money
episodes.overview: Khloe contemplates being friendly towards Kim's new man and Kourtney plans a get together for the family and it gets out of hand.

episodes.title: Kim Becomes a Stage Mom
episodes.overview: Kendall's modeling career takes her to New York and she enlists Kim to help her. Scott and Kris are at odds with each other over a key to Kourtney and Scott's house.

episodes.title: The Former Mrs. Jenner
episodes.overview: Kris decides to change her name back to Kardashian, much to Bruce's displeasure. Kim is tired of people asking if her butt is real & gets an x-ray to set the world straight.

episodes.title: Out of Wedlock
episodes.overview: Kourtney contemplates having another child out of wedlock.

episodes.title: Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Kris thinks Bruce is losing his hearing; Rob admits to Kourtney why they don't hang out anymore.

episodes.title: Kendall Goes on Birth Control
episodes.overview: Bruce finds out Kendall is taking birth control & decides it's time to talk about the birds & bees. Kim discovers a serious rash on her legs & fears her career may be over.

episodes.title: The Have and the Have Nots
episodes.overview: Bruce tries to get his daughters to see how blessed they are.

episodes.title: What Happens in Vegas, Stays in Vegas
episodes.overview: Scott goes to Vegas, and Kourtney is afraid that he will return to his old ways. Kylie and Kendall think their mother Kris is meddling in their lives.

episodes.title: Talk to My Agent
episodes.overview: Kris gets mad at Scott when he tries to become Kylie and Kendall's manager, and Kim doesn't know how to dance so she gets embarrassed.

episodes.title: The Family Vacation
episodes.overview: Kris and Bruce take a vacation to Bora Bora to renew vows and also as a family vacation.

episodes.title: Getting to Know You
episodes.overview: Kris has self-image issues that threaten the anniversary celebration in Bora Bora; and Kourtney tries to get Scott and Rob to reconcile.

episodes.title: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Rob feels insecure about not having a career and it causes him to lash out at Kim while they are in Bora Bora. And Kourtney gives Scott an ultimatum.

episodes.title: The Proposal
episodes.overview: Kris Humphries plans to ask Kim to marry him, but an argument between the two makes him wonder if he is proceeding too quickly.

episodes.title: Kim's Fairytale Wedding: A Kardashian Event Part I
episodes.overview: This is going to be a special 2-hour Wedding, Kim Kardashian will host the night with her husband Kris Humphries.

episodes.title: Kim's Fairytale Wedding: A Kardashian Event Part II
episodes.overview: The wedding of Kim and Kris is shown. Guest includes Eva Longoria, Avril Lavigne, Goerge Lopez, Mario Lopez and Demi Lovato.

episodes.title: Kendall's Sweet 16
episodes.overview: The Kardashians celebrate Kendall's sweet 16.

episodes.title: Kim's House Party
episodes.overview: Kim throws a housewarming party and Kourtney contemplates moving out of Khloe's house because Scott is not invited there.

episodes.title: Blind Date
episodes.overview: Kim goes on a blind date with someone that Kris set her up with; Lamar is in the play-offs and Khloe deals with the pressure.

episodes.title: The Missing Ring
episodes.overview: Khloé is stuck between a rock and a hard place when she loses her seven-carat engagement ring and is afraid to tell Lamar.

episodes.title: My Bodyguard
episodes.overview: Kim develops a serious crush on her hot Australian bodyguard and Khloé helps Lamar to finally learn how to swim.

episodes.title: Botox and Cigarettes
episodes.overview: Fearful of aging, Kim gets botox and has a bad physical reaction. Meanwhile, the family discovers that Kris is a closet smoker and Kourt is determined to get her to quit.

episodes.title: Kourt Goes A.W.O.L
episodes.overview: While Kourtney looks for a place to live in New York, her family does what they can to get her to stay in Los Angeles. Bruce looks into getting his dog neutered.

episodes.title: Match Made in Hell
episodes.overview: Rob begins to date his sister Khloe's best friend. Kris contemplates managing another client.

episodes.title: No Boys Allowed
episodes.overview: Kourtney and Scott struggle to have another baby; Bruce has difficulty accepting that 12 year-old Kylie has male friends.

episodes.title: Kris 'The Cougar' Jenner
episodes.overview: Kris flirts with her handsome personal trainer and things get out of hand; Kim's competitive nature gets her into trouble with Kourtney.

episodes.title: Dash No More
episodes.overview: Kim meets football star Miles Austin; Kourtney thinks about expanding D-A-S-H by moving to New York but her sisters are against the idea. Meanwhile, Scott and Bruce spend some bonding time together.

episodes.title: The Kardashians Take NYC
episodes.overview: The episode ends with a sneak peak at the second spin-off, Kourtney and Kim Take New York.

episodes.title: The Wedding
episodes.overview: Khloe marries NBA star Lamar Odom.

episodes.title: Scott On The Rocks
episodes.overview: Kourtney and Scott find themselves pitted against her family because disapprove of him. Scott invites the family to see the sex of the baby.

episodes.title: Hot Cup Of Love
episodes.overview: Khloé is forced to get professional help for her anger issues towards Scott after hitting him. Rob ends up in the hospital when he accidentally takes a male enhancement drug meant for Bruce. Kris tries to be in the mood with Bruce.

episodes.title: Baby Blues
episodes.overview: Khloé gets excited when she thinks she's pregnant. Kim's tendency to tell 'little white lies' gets her into big trouble.

episodes.title: Shape Up or Ship Out
episodes.overview: Kourtney confronts Scott when he fails to take her pregnancy seriously; Kris takes away Bruce's ATM card, which leads him to demand financial independence.

episodes.title: Must Love Dogs
episodes.overview: Kim takes in a stray Chihuahua and is devastated when she must give it up; Bruce pressures Rob to move out of the house.

episodes.title: Body Blows
episodes.overview: Bruce volunteers the family to help out at a charity boxing event; Kourtney babysits for some friends and learns a valuable lesson in child care.

episodes.title: Weekend from Hell
episodes.overview: Kourtney, Kim and Khloe take an ill-fated weekend trip to Santa Barbara. Back at home, Kylie becomes jealous of Kendall.

episodes.title: I Want Your Sex
episodes.overview: Khloé makes a 'love tape' for her husband Lamar Odom of the Los Angeles Lakers. Meanwhile, Kourt learns to enjoy sex again while pregnant.

episodes.title: Blame It On the Alcohol
episodes.overview: Kourtney ends her relationship with Scott after he gets violently drunk on Kim's birthday in Las Vegas. On top of the world, Kim takes on more work than she should.

episodes.title: Delivering Baby Mason
episodes.overview: After fainting from exhaustion, Kim learns to manage her professional life. Kourt takes Scott back and gives birth to their baby son, Mason!

episodes.title: Free Khloe
episodes.overview: Khloe goes to jail for violating her parole. Kris visits Robert Kardashian's grave.

episodes.title: Kourt's First Cover
episodes.overview: Kourtney hires Kris as her manager. Rob & Adrienne encounter some problems when they move in together.

episodes.title: I'd Rather Go Naked... Or Shopping
episodes.overview: Khloe feels pressure from Bruce and the media to lose weight after joining the "I'd Rather Go Naked" PETA campaign, and Kim's family worries about her constant shopping habit and get an interventionist.

episodes.title: Pussycat Vision
episodes.overview: Kim undergoes eye surgery before performing with The Pussycat Dolls. Meanwhile, Bruce is due to receive a colonoscopy.

episodes.title: All For One And One For Kim
episodes.overview: Kris tries to get closer with Bruce. Kim gets a perfume line and Khloe and Kourtney aren't happy. they get into a big fight.

episodes.title: Cinderella Story
episodes.overview: Khloe wants to get a DNA test to see if Kris is really her mom. Rob gets a new tattoo that Kris isn't happy about.

episodes.title: The Two Year Itch
episodes.overview: Kourtney accuses Scott of cheating. Khloe has a biopsy to check for skin cancer.

episodes.title: Distance Makes the Heart Grow Fonder
episodes.overview: Khloe wants to move to New York, much to the dismay of Kris. Kim faces a difficult decision in choosing between her boyfriend and her career.

episodes.title: Leaving the Nest
episodes.overview: Khloe goes apartment hunting in New York. The girls buy Kris a monkey.

episodes.title: Meet the Kardashians
episodes.overview: Bruce undergoes plastic surgery; the Kardashians meet Adrienne Bailon's family for the first time when they all go camping together.

episodes.title: What's Yours is Mine
episodes.overview: Kourtney and Kim's relationships are threatened when Kourtney continues to test Kim's boundaries when she keeps taking her stuff without asking.

episodes.title: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Kourtney and Khloe deal with the heart breaking reality that both their relationships have come to an end.

episodes.title: Kim Becomes A Diva
episodes.overview: Fame goes to Kim's head; Kourtney confronts Scott about cheating on her.

episodes.title: Khloe Wants To Act
episodes.overview: Khloe pursues an acting career, much to Kim's dismay; Bruce receives a fashion makeover.

episodes.title: Rob's New Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Rob falls for a pop singer; Kris buys some chickens for the house.

episodes.title: Kris the Cheerleader
episodes.overview: Kris attends tryouts to be a cheerleader; Kendall's sisters teach her about puberty.

episodes.title: Khloe's Blind Dates
episodes.overview: Khloe is set up on blind dates by her sisters; Kendall hires a handyman to help with chores.

episodes.title: Learning Self Defense
episodes.overview: The ladies learn the art of self-defense after a break-in at the shop; Rob drops out of college to become a model.

episodes.title: Kardashian Civil War
episodes.overview: Kim, Khloe and Kourtney get into a fight that threatens to damage their relationships; Bruce feels he is out of touch with the modern generation.

episodes.title: Kardashian Family Vacation
episodes.overview: Kris insists the family take a vacation in Colorado in hopes of putting an end to some bickering, but the trip doesn't go exactly as planned.

episodes.title: Kim's Calendar for Reggie
episodes.overview: Kim explodes when she learns a sexy calendar she made for her boyfriend, Reggie Bush, is being made available to the general public; Bruce tries to inspire Khloe and Kourtney.

episodes.title: A New Perspective in New Orleans
episodes.overview: The sisters travel to New Orleans to attend a pool tournament sponsored by Reggie Bush and to visit devastated parts of the city hit by Hurricane Katrina.

episodes.title: Junk in the Trunk
episodes.overview: The family members view previously unaired footage and share some of their favorite moments from the series.

episodes.title: I'm Watching You
episodes.overview: Bruce Jenner and Kris Jenner celebrate their anniversary. Kim Kardashian appears on The Tyra Banks Show.

episodes.title: Managing Mom
episodes.overview: Kim "fires" Kris from being her manager after using racy pictures of her which she really didn't want to be used. Meanwhile, Kris hires a nanny named Bree, who isn't as appropriate and decent of a nanny as she thought she would be. Kim later takes Kris back as her manager, after forgiving her for her mistake.

episodes.title: Brody In The House
episodes.overview: Kourtney, Kim and Khloé go to Mexico for a Girls Gone Wild photo shoot without telling Bruce, as they are afraid that he will disapprove. He finds out and leaves his son Brody Jenner to babysit Kylie and Kendall while he goes to Mexico to confront them.

episodes.title: Birthday Suit
episodes.overview: Playboy magazine contacts Kris, asking her to tell Kim that they want her to be on the cover of their December 2007 issue. Kim is at first hesitant, but at Kris' urge, Kim poses for Playboy. Kris thinks that Kim is complaining over the photoshoot too much and Kim thinks that Kris doesn't know how hard it is to pose nude, so Kim "plays" manager for a day by setting her mom up for a nude photoshoot, which Kris surprisingly handles well.

episodes.title: Remembering Dad
episodes.overview: The family remembers Robert Kardashian on his death anniversary. Khloé doesn't deal with his anniversary well and gets drunk. She is then arrested for a DUI.

episodes.title: You Are So Pregnant Dude
episodes.overview: Kourtney, Kim and Khloé are about to leave to Las Vegas when Kourtney has a pregnancy scare. Meanwhile, Kendall & Kylie ask their dad for a puppy, and he says no, but Kris goes behind his back and buys them a puppy anyway, which makes him upset, as he feels like Kris never lets him make decisions.

episodes.title: Helping Hand
episodes.overview: Khloé and Kourtney find out that a homeless man called Shorty is living behind their store D-A-S-H, and they decide to help him out by cleaning his appearance up.

episodes.title: The Price Of Fame
episodes.overview: Scandalous photos of Kourtney and Kim resurface, which makes Kim both scared and humiliated, as she already feels like she really screwed up with her sex tape.

episodes.title: Khloe & Lamar - The Wedding Special
episodes.overview: Khloe and Lamar - Wedding Special

episodes.title: Ryan Seacrest with the Kardashians
episodes.overview: Ryan Seacrest interviews members of the Kardashian-Jenner family over dinner, during which they discuss their success as reality-TV stars.

episodes.title: A Verry Merry Christmas
episodes.overview: This special Christmas episode features the debut of this years Kardashian Christmas card, as well as the family opening presents and watching back old home footage of past Christmases.
